cbinstall.name: CB Profile Notifier
cbinstall.author: Bruce Scherzinger
cbinstall.description:
Community Builder Profile Notifier Plug-In v2.2

© Bruce Scherzinger, http://joomlander.net

Sends emails to the site administrator or other specified address when any user profile field is modified.

The notification email indicates which fields were modified, their previous values and new values.

The following default placeholders can be used anywhere in the notification email subject or message body:

  • [SITE] - name of the website
  • [USER] - name of the user
  • [USERNAME] - username of the user

The following placeholders can be used only in the message body:

  • [OPTION] - name of option changed (the field label, e.g., "Your Address")
  • [FIELD] - name of field changed (the actual field name, e.g., "cb_address")
  • [OLD] - previous value
  • [NEW] - new value

A separate line will be inserted into the message body for each modification the user makes. When HTML format is used, you can make this appear as a bulleted list. When Text format is used, there is no formatting capability at all (not even using newlines).

Additional placeholders can be defined using the name of any field in either the _users or _comprofiler table. As an example, to include the field cb_streetaddress in the message enter the field name in the box provided and then use the placeholder [STREETADDRESS] anywhere in the message body.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: INCLUDE THESE STANDARD FIELDS
param.description: Select NO if you do not want to check these standard Joomla and CB fields.

param.name: name
param.label: Full Name
param.description: Joomla registered full name

param.name: username
param.label: Username
param.description: Joomla registered username

param.name: email
param.label: Email Address
param.description: Joomla registered email address

param.name: firstname
param.label: First Name
param.description: CB First Name

param.name: middlename
param.label: Middle Name
param.description: CB Middle Name (as applicable)

param.name: lastname
param.label: Last Name
param.description: CB Last Name (as applicable)

param.name: excludes
param.label: Exclude fields
param.description: Enter the names of any other fields you wish to exclude, separated by commas. All fields not listed here or checked as NO above will be checked.

param.name: register_notify
param.label: Notify admin of new user registration
param.description: Do you want to send email notification when a new user registers?

param.name: regdefaults
param.label: Default Field Values
param.description: Enter field=value, one per line.

param.name: backend_notify
param.label: Notify of back-end changes
param.description: Do you want to send email notification of changes made in the site back end?

param.name: frontend_notify
param.label: Notify of front-end changes
param.description: Do you want to send email notification of changes made in the site front end?

param.name: friends_notify
param.label: Notify connections of front-end changes
param.description: Do you want to send email notification of changes made in the site front end (by the user) to the users connections?

param.name: admin_addr
param.label: Admin Address(es)
param.description: Enter one or more addresses to receive Admin notices, separated by commas. Leave blank to use site administrator address. NOTE: On some servers, this address may have to be different than the Site Administrator address or no message will be sent to the Admin.

param.name: placeholders
param.label: Custom Placeholders
param.description: Enter names of user or comprofiler table fields you want to be able to insert into messages. Example: enter cb_middlename and then use [MIDDLENAME] in your message to include the field. Use commas, spaces, or line breaks to delimit.

param.name: email_format
param.label: Email Format
param.description: Which format should be used for sending the messages?

param.name: email_prefix
param.label: Message Prefix
param.description: Enter the front part of the message text to send. HTML is allowed.

param.name: email_msg
param.label: Message Body
param.description: Enter the message text to include for each change made. HTML is allowed.

param.name: email_suffix
param.label: Message Suffix
param.description: Enter the end part of the message text to send. HTML is allowed.

param.name: email_subject
param.label: Email Subject
param.description: Enter the subject of your notification emails.

param.name: email_from_addr
param.label: From Address
param.description: Enter the From address for email notices. Leave blank to use site administrator address.

param.name: email_from_name
param.label: From Name
param.description: Enter the From name for email notices. Leave blank to use site administrator name.
